entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near Juan de Fuca Strait. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 4.
